short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to schedule daily reminders with customizable schedules and notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay organized and on top of your daily tasks with the Reminder Extension! Whether you're managing work tasks, personal errands, or regular reminders, our extension ensures you never miss an important moment.

Features:

- Daily Reminders: Set up daily reminders to keep you on track with your schedule. Customize reminders for different days of the week and receive timely notifications.
- Smart Notifications: Get notified about your reminders at the right time. Choose whether to receive audible notifications or keep it silent based on your preferences.
- Customizable Settings: Tailor your reminder settings to match your lifestyle. Adjust notification settings, enable/disable reminders, and more.
- Clear Notifications: Easily clear notifications and manage your reminders with a click of a button. Ensure your reminder list is always up-to-date.
- User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design makes setting and managing reminders a breeze. No complicated menus or settings.

How to Use:

1. Install the Extension: Add the Reminder Extension to your Chrome browser.
2. Set Reminders: Click on the extension icon and set your daily reminders. Customize the schedule, delay, and notification preferences.
3. Receive Notifications: Get notified about your reminders as per your settings. Manage notifications easily through the extension interface.
4. Clear and Manage: Clear notifications and update your reminders as needed to keep everything organized.

Why Choose The Daily Reminder Extension?

- Convenience: Keep track of your daily tasks without hassle.
- Customization: Personalize your reminders to fit your unique schedule.
- Efficiency: Stay efficient and never miss a deadline or task again.

Download the Reminder Extension today and take control of your daily tasks with ease!
